===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} ''General of Fast Cavalry'' (a high [[military]] [[rank]] held by [[general]]s in ancient [[China]])

===Usage notes===
Ranked just below supreme general ([[大將軍]]). Same rank as general of chariots and cavalry ([[車騎將軍]]).
: piàojì: is the traditional orthodox pronunciation (still prevalent in Taiwan)
: piàoqí: has become more accepted in recent years (especially in the PRC).
